channel.title: Obelisk-RS || Stable Economy || [24/7] VPS || Flawless Combat || Daily Updates
channel.description:
[center][img]https://www.dropbox.com/s/8xe0lnosjfu0u8w/obelisk.gif?dl=1[/img]
[SIZE=5]Links:[/SIZE] [SIZE=3][URL=http://"http://obelisk-rs.com/home"]Home[/URL] [URL=http://"http://obelisk-rs.com/forum"]Forum[/URL] [url=http://"http://obelisk-rs.com/vote"]Vote[/url] [url=http://"http://obelisk-rs.com/Donate"]Donate[/url] [URL=http://"http://obelisk-rs.com/download"]Download Client[/URL] [URL=http://"http://obelisk-rs.com/webclient"]Webclient[/URL][/SIZE]
[SIZE=5]Features:[/SIZE] [SIZE=3] 24/7 VPS Hosting 24 Skills are working! Stable Economy Friendly Staff Vote for Rewards Auto Donations Flawless Combat Tons of Bosses Membership Options Custom Teleporting 100% Summoning 20 New Clue scroll locations 5+ Minigames to encounter 3 Quests to complete Handcannon A Skilling Task Minigame Slayer with boss tasks Armadyl battlestaff with crafting armadyl runes Full Ape Atoll access Completionist Cape Requirements (Hard) Max cape obtaining Variety of shops for starters A homemade starters area with skilling zone implemented 20+ Achievements to complete Prestigeing for points or ranks Full on organized quest book with clickable text (Statistics etc.) Amazing Combat for Pkers 100% Dicing! Flower Poker! Strykewyrms Godwars Dungeon All Specials working Double XP Weekends Double Drop Weekends Working Nex Gear!!! And so so so much more..[/SIZE]
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v3eLypYtQ9A&list=UU3wjOEOGtBikgz39tmwTBHQ[/youtube]
